metadata.Title: CVE-2023-5561 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: WordPress does not properly restrict which user fields are searchable via the REST API, allowing unauthenticated attackers to discern the email addresses of users who have published public posts on an affected website via an Oracle style attack

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
